document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">solemn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">ended </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Play </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Glee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">among </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Garret </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Holiday </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">leaving </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Home, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">later, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Parting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">World </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">understood </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">better </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">explained </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: That is solemn we have ended
